name: Priceshredder
description: Souqalmal.com is the leading comparison website in the Middle East: it lets compare, search, and get information on financial products.
goals: Add notification and modal popups support
Create a design for Buyer profile and Seller/Buyer Dashboard
solutions: We chose WebSockets implementation to support multi-user accounts
implementation of the Stripe payment system
outcome: The useful and popular smartphone-based platform that helps insurance buyers receive and manage bids from major insurance companies. As a result, PriceShredder allows an easier, faster, and more efficient way to shop for insurance.
